hero.name: Ash Vogl
hero.subtitle: a front-end developer with a passion for elegant, accessible solutions.

about.title: About me
about.primary: I've always held a love for the worlds of design and technology, and since the beginning of my professional career I've strived to bring them together. I've spent the last several years developing proprietary software in an agile working environment, fostering my skills as a front-end developer. I love to take on challenging design problems, whether it's crafting a unified experience, untangling user feedback, or simply asking, "How can we make this better?"
about.secondary: When I'm not creating new features or hunting down bugs, I am an avid gamer, dungeon master, and artist. I especially love character design, making creatures and the realms they live in. I also take care of a little orange and white cat, who likes to be helpful by stepping on my keyboard.

projects.title: SWIM Website Redesign
projects.description: Scaling Wellness in Milwaukee is a nonprofit organization founded in 2018 that supports traumatized individuals with holistic healing and workplace training. When they sought volunteers for their CMS website redesign through CatchAFire.org, I was happy to step up to the challenge!

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
